forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
